DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective clinical trial determine replace sugar sweeten beverage water consumption promote weight loss 6 month overweight adult replace sugar sweeten beverage water consumption promote great weight loss 6 month relative replacement non-caloric sweeten beverage control . The secondary objective identify mediator moderator effect water replacement include hydration status , glucose metabolism , anthropometrics , physical activity , dietary intake rest metabolic rate .
DOC.brief_title: Trial Water Beverage Intervention Promoting Modest Weight Reduction Free Living Adults
DOC.criteria: 1865 year age . Body mass index ( BMI ) 25.049.9 kg/m2 . Subject consumes least 280 calorie per day caloric beverage . Report lose > 5 % current body weight previous 6 month . Report participate research project involve weight loss physical activity previous 6 month , proximal experience may impact result study . Additionally , report current participate research study whose result could compromise participation could compromise research study . ( Participation research study would affect affected study allow . ) Report pregnancy lactation previous 6 month , plan pregnancy next 6 month . Report take medication could affect metabolism change body weight ( e.g. , synthroid ) . Report hospitalization psychiatric problem prior year . Report major psychiatric diagnosis organic brain syndrome . Report heart problem , chest pain , cancer within last 5 year Being treat therapist psychological issue problem psychotropic medication . Report behavior indicate probable alcohol dependence assess Rapid Alcohol Problems Screen ( RAPS4QF ) ( Cherpitel CJ , 2002 ) . Unwilling change intake beverage study period . Plan move area study period , and/or unable attend monthly group meeting . Report adequate transportation study center would allow transport study supply back subject 's home . Report able attend group meeting Monday Tuesday evening .
